type: Supply and Delivery of Eastern White Cedar Shingles B
short_summary: Parks Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of either thick cut Air-dried (green) Eastern White Cedar shingles or Western Red Cedar shingles to CSA 0118.1 standard.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 13, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

Supply and Delivery of Eastern White Cedar Shingles and Western Red Cedar Shingles

### Name and Titles (English and French)

- **English**: Supply and Delivery of Eastern White Cedar Shingles B
- **French**: La fourniture et la livraison de bardeaux en thuya occidental B

## Tender Details

- **Reference Number**: WS3792110498-Doc3851622880
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3792110498
- **Publication Date**: January 31, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
- **Amendment Date**: February 9, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 23, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: None
- **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

## Commodities

- **UNSPSC Code**: 30151508
- **UNSPSC Description**: Shingles
- **Commodity Description (English)**: Thick Cut Air-dried (green) Eastern White Cedar Shingles and Western Red Cedar Shingles to CSA 0118.1 standard
- **Commodity Description (French)**: Bardeaux de thuya occidental séchés à l’air (vert) coupés épais et bardeaux en thuya géant conformément à la norme CSA O118.1

## Procurement Information

- **Procurment Category**: Government Department (GD)
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Entity and End User

- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
- **End User**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
- **End User Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada

## Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Shelly Unser (SPAC/PSPC)
